name: 6th Edition of International Nutrition Research Conference
content: Magnus Group extends a warm invitation for your participation in the prestigious "6th Edition of International Nutrition Research Conference" (Nutrition 2024), scheduled to take place in the vibrant city of Rome, Italy from September 16-18, 2024\. In recognition of the current global circumstances, Nutrition 2024 will offer virtual attendance options as well. The congress will center around the theme, "Showcasing Trends Evolving to fill Nutritional Gaps through Technology and Healthcare advancements” This groundbreaking event will encompass a diverse range of topics within the realm of nutrition, uniting a plethora of experts, including researchers, scientists, academicians, healthcare professionals, public health experts, and specialists in the field of nutrition. Nutrition Conferences 2024 promises to feature enlightening keynote speakers, engaging panel sessions with distinguished speakers, insightful seminars, as well as dynamic oral and poster presentations. The event will also host a variety of scientific and public health exhibitors. Over the course of three days, our focus will be on the latest trends and advancements in the field of nutrition. We'll delve into cutting-edge research and developments, emphasizing effective strategies for promoting optimal nutrition and its implications for public health.
